name: Vegas Casino
summary: Welcome to Vegas Casino VR, where you step into the shoes of an ambitious casino manager determined to reach billionaire status. Start small by serving clients — delivering poker chips, equipment, and exclusive services to keep the tables running smoothly. As you earn profits, upgrade your casino with lavish décor, high-stakes poker rooms, and premium amenities. Manage demanding VIP guests, unlock rare equipment, and master the art of timing to maximize your earnings. Will you become a casino mogul or...
